The number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in England so far as at 16 November is 1,194,402 (2,122 cases per 100,000 population). In the seven days to 11 November, there were 152,661 new confirmed cases (271.2 new cases per 100,000). In the seven days to 04 November, there were 138,144 new cases and so the new cases have risen by 11% ( 14,517 extra cases).
